content: *materials * - puritan star spangled mercerized crochet cotton article 40 2 balls silver spangle or color of your choice - steel crochet hook no 7 - approximate size 19 inches in diameter - puritan mercerized crochet cotton size 10 1 ball white or color of your choice - steel crochet hook no 7 - approximate size 17 inches in diameter or - gem mercerized crochet cotton size 30 1 ball white or color of your choice - steel crochet hook no 12 - approximate size 11 inches in diameter
